loadCodeDialog.description: Loading code will delete all existing code and this action cannot be undone.
loadCodeDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?

messages: Patience is a virtue of all programmers
Sometimes taking a walk is the best debug strategy
Don't forget to drink water, programmers are human too

openPortalInstructionCards.content: Use your navigation bar to connect your laptop to the same wifi network that CYOCrawler connected to previously.

openPortalInstructionCards.header: 2. Type CYOCrawler’s IP into a new browser
openPortalInstructionCards.content: Your Crawler will show a unique IP on its LED screen (e.g, 192.168.100.200). Type the IP shown into a new tab on your browser.
Now, your Crawler’s IP address has become your personal portal address. Next time, just type in this IP into your browser to connect to the portal while going online.
